详情；细节；细节描述；详细资料；特殊之处；特定细目；特别事项

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 特别地，独特地；详细地，具体地；明确地，细致地
特殊神宠论；完全忠于一种理论

word_mean_info__list.difference: 强调指与众不同或独特的意思。
和special含义很接近，较正式，但侧重有特殊的意义或重要性。
着重指某种、某类事物具有的特殊或特定的属性，也可指专门提出作特别考虑的事物。
侧重不同于普遍性的个性或特殊性。
普通用词，指不同于一般、与众不同，着重事物的专门性，突出与一般不同。
指不同于一般，本身是特别的或异常的事物。
语气比exceptional强，指极大地超过一般或正常情况。

word_group.brief_definition: 特别注意；特别关注；特别重视
特殊情况；个别情况；特殊案例
特别问题；特定问题；特殊问题
特别关切；特别关注；尤其关心
特定形式；特别形式；特殊形式
特定设施；特定设备；个别设备

bilingual.source: Aunt Polly's awful particular about this fence.
bilingual.target: 波莉姑妈对这个围栏特别讲究。

bilingual.source: Is there anything else in particular that you'd like to share with us?
bilingual.target: 你还有什么特别想和我们分享的吗？

bilingual.source: Last week, Anne was attracted by a particular article in a magazine, so she bought it.
bilingual.target: 上周，安妮被杂志上的一篇特定文章吸引了，所以她买了它。

bilingual.source: Placing stress on particular words can have a big impact on the meaning and strength of apologies.
bilingual.target: 强调特定词语会对道歉的意义和力度产生重大影响。

bilingual.source: One particular organisation based in Europe is planning to send the first humans to Mars before 2030.
bilingual.target: 一家位于欧洲的组织计划在2030年前送第一批人类到火星。

bilingual.source: I only joined my local athletics club because my doctor told me that in my particular case exercise could improve how my lungs work.
bilingual.target: 我加入当地田径俱乐部只是因为医生告诉我，在我的特殊情况下，锻炼可以改善肺功能。
你怀疑特别的某个人吗？

bilingual.source: This recipe requires a particular type of cheese.
bilingual.target: 这个食谱需要特定的一种奶酪。

bilingual.source: She has a particular interest in ancient history.
bilingual.target: 她对古代历史有特定的兴趣。

bilingual.source: The team lacks expertise in this particular field.
bilingual.target: 这个团队在这个特定领域缺乏专业知识。

list.abstract: Particular（英[pəˈtɪkjələ]，美[pərˈtɪkjələr]），英语单词，作形容词用，为特定的；特别的；特大的。作名词用，为特殊性；一点；一个细节。短语搭配有in particular（尤其, 特别），例句为“Batteries can pose a particular danger.（电池会造成一种特别的危险。）” Particular形容词类近义词有extraordinary、strict、detailed等，名词类近义词有detailed specification、detailed description，相关反义词有general、universal、universal proposition。Particular副词形式为particularly，形容词形式为particularist，名词形式为particularity、particularism、particularization。

yingyinNormal.en: What about Josh in particular?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么单独针对乔希这个人呢？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not an expert on that particular subspecies.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在研究男性物种方面，我并不是专家。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyone in particular you have in mind, Ms. Groves?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有特定的人选了吗？格罗夫斯女士？

yingyinNormal.en: They don't talk incessantly for no particular reason.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们不会无来由地说个不停。

yingyinNormal.en: One particular employer took their failure very very badly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有一个主人对他们犯的错误十分愤怒。

yingyinNormal.en: No one in particular. But what was his name? I don't know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是什么大人物。那他叫什么？我不知道。

yingyinNormal.en: Where are we right now? And why are we in this particular part?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们现在在哪里？我们为什么会在这个特设的区域？
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: Any particular reason why? I don't know, just having a good day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有什么特别的原因吗？不知道，就是今天过得还不错。

yingyinNormal.en: And they're willing to pay extra to get that particular size onion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们愿意付出额外的金钱。来得到那个完美大小的洋葱。

yingyinNormal.en: That day, for no particular reason, I decided to go for a little run.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那一天不知什么原因，我决定出去跑一趟。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, really one resource in particular. One unique to our planet. Us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，确切的说是一种特别的资源，地球特有的。我们。

yingyinNormal.en: No particular reason. I just kept on going. I ran clear to the ocean.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不知什么原因，我继续跑，我一直跑到大海。

yingyinNormal.en: That particular dog of war will have to call you back after his bath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那只战争恶魔会在洗完澡以后回你电话。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't bother. I've wasted many an hour tilting at that particular windmill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不用费心了，我已经浪费太多时间攻击这座顽固的风车了。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you know it aired live? There's a particular savvy in that, isn't there?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道整个过程都被直播了吗？真是妙，对不对？

yingyinNormal.en: Meaning? You took out that one particular ship, and the rest just gave up? Why?
yingyinNormal.zh: 意味着？你击落那一架飞船然后其他飞船就都放弃了抵抗，为什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, actually, if you do the part with that particular song, I imagined it much slow...
yingyinNormal.zh: 对了，如果你们要用那首歌速度应该要慢一点。

yingyinNormal.en: But it also leaves us a lot of trouble in particular things like envy and our happiness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但它也带来许多负面影响特别是嫉妒和我们的满足感。

yingyinNormal.en: His ideas about the male preoccupation with size might be of particular interest to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他研究男性对尺寸的重视，你可能会有兴趣。

yingyinNormal.en: A particular type of scientist, called a cosmologist, spends her time thinking about that very question.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有一种科学家，被称为宇宙学家，她们就专门思考这样的问题。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (in particular)尤其; 特别; 格外

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 特别；尤其；异乎寻常地；特别地；明确地；特别是

word_family.mean: adj. 特定的；特别的；特大的；特强烈的；苛求的；挑剔的；难以取悦的；特殊的；特称的

sense_info_list.zh: (in particular)尤其; 特别; 格外

examination_example.sentence: Another approach to getting more done in less time is to rethink how you prioritise your day — in <highlight>particular</highlight> how we craft our to-do lists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个用更少的时间完成更多事情的方法是重新思考你如何安排一天的优先顺序——尤其是我们如何制定我们的待办事项清单。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>particular</highlight>, they called for forging closer collaborations with western state governments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们尤其呼吁与西方州政府建立更紧密的合作。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>particular</highlight>, the corporate workplace will never be completely family-friendly until women are part of senior management decisions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尤其是在企业中，职场从来都不会完全对家庭生活友好，除非女性能在高级管理决策层占有一席之地。

sense_info_list.en: unique or specific to a person or thing or category

examination_example.sentence: And you don't have to be someone's boss to tell them they did an exceptional job on a <highlight>particular</highlight> project.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你也不必成为某人的老板来告诉他们，他们在一个特定的项目上做得非常出色。

examination_example.sentence: Which way is down hill, in this <highlight>particular</highlight> area?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这个特定的地区，下山是哪条路？

examination_example.sentence: Even better would be to help elevate notions of beauty beyond the material standards of a <highlight>particular</highlight> industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更好的办法是帮助提升美的概念，超越特定行业的物质标准。

examination_example.sentence: In the UK, it has become a big talking point recently too, for a rather <highlight>particular</highlight> reason: Brexit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在英国，它最近也成为了一个重要的话题，原因很独特: 英国退出欧盟。

examination_example.sentence: How we read a given text also depends to some extent on our <highlight>particular</highlight> interest in reading it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们如何阅读给定的文本在某种程度上也取决于我们对阅读它的特殊兴趣。

sense_info_list.en: separate and distinct from others of the same group or category
insisting that something should be correct or suitable in every detail

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 为 -ule + -ar 的组合, "有…形状或性质的"

word_usage.usage:
作形容词表示“特别的”时：
particular强调事物的独特性，侧重不同于普遍性的个性，只作定语。
special强调专门的或特意的，突出与一般不同，而especial强调非同寻常的，可与special换用，但special比especial更常用。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: “个别的”，指在固定事物中某一事物具有的独特性。
“单一的、单个的”，强调只有一个，引申可指“单人的、未婚的、独身的”。
“单独的、个别的”，强调单独性与其他事物分离或不相连。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 特别；尤其；异乎寻常地；特别地；明确地；特别是

word_family.mean: adj. 特定的；特别的；特大的；特强烈的；苛求的；挑剔的；难以取悦的；特殊的；特称的

sense_info_list.en: unique or specific to a person or thing or category

examination_example.sentence: To adapt themselves to a <highlight>particular</highlight> lifestyle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让自己适应特定的生活方式。

examination_example.sentence: An attitude is a settled way of thinking, feeling and/or behaving towards <highlight>particular</highlight> objects, people, events or ideologies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 态度是对特定对象、人、事件或意识形态的一种固定的思考、感觉和行为方式。

examination_example.sentence: It is also critical for socially charged neuroscience issues such as the genetic basis for a <highlight>particular</highlight> behavior.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这对于社会所关注的神经科学问题也至关重要，例如特定行为的遗传基础。

sense_info_list.en: separate and distinct from others of the same group or category

examination_example.sentence: Ease of care was most important; summer dresses and outfits, in <highlight>particular</highlight>, were chiefly cotton, readily capable of being washed and pressed at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 易于护理是最重要的; 特别是夏天的裙子和套装都主要是棉布制成的，很容易在家里洗和熨。

sense_info_list.en: detailed information about someone or something
insisting that something should be correct or suitable in every detail

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 为 -ule + -ar 的组合, "有…形状或性质的"

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 特别；尤其；异乎寻常地；特别地；明确地；特别是

word_family.mean: adj. 特定的；特别的；特大的；特强烈的；苛求的；挑剔的；难以取悦的；特殊的；特称的

sense_info_list.en: unique or specific to a person or thing or category

examination_example.sentence: Cultures without numbers also offer insight into the cognitive influence of <highlight>particular</highlight> numeric traditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有数字的文化也提供了对特定数字传统认知影响的洞察。

examination_example.sentence: Batteries can pose a <highlight>particular</highlight> danger.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电池会造成一种特别的危险。

examination_example.sentence: I'm not familiar with your neighbor or his <highlight>particular</highlight> setup, but that amount is definitely possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不了解你的邻居或者是他具体是如何安装的，但达到这个金额是绝对有可能的。

sense_info_list.en: separate and distinct from others of the same group or category

examination_example.sentence: Recent research has found that one trait in <highlight>particular</highlight>—humility (谦逊) —is an important indicator of successful relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近的研究发现，谦逊这一特别的品质是成功人际关系的一个重要指标。

examination_example.sentence: The difference, however, is in the nature and scope of these responsibilities in the home environment in <highlight>particular</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，区别在于这些责任的性质和范围，尤其是在家庭环境中。

examination_example.sentence: On one <highlight>particular</highlight> United States island, wild pigs themselves became an attractive food source for a species of mainland eagle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国的一个岛屿上，野猪成为了一种大陆鹰的诱人食物来源。

sense_info_list.en: insisting that something should be correct or suitable in every detail

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 为 -ule + -ar 的组合, "有…形状或性质的"

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 特别；尤其；异乎寻常地；特别地；明确地；特别是

word_family.mean: adj. 特定的；特别的；特大的；特强烈的；苛求的；挑剔的；难以取悦的；特殊的；特称的

sense_info_list.en: separate and distinct from others of the same group or category

examination_example.sentence: This requires commitment to a <highlight>particular</highlight> occupation, branch of study or research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这需要对特定职业、研究分支或研究做出承诺。

examination_example.sentence: Two scientists reported that young maple trees getting bitten by insects send out a <highlight>particular</highlight> smell that neighboring plants can get.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两位科学家曾发表称，小枫树被昆虫叮咬后，会散发出一种特殊的气味，相邻的植物也会闻到这种气味。

examination_example.sentence: I homed in, with uncertainty, on one <highlight>particular</highlight> table at the Brown's Grove Farm's stand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我忐忑不安地回到布朗家森林农场摊位处的一张桌子前。

sense_info_list.en: unique or specific to a person or thing or category

examination_example.sentence: Leslie Nielsen's childhood was a difficult one, but he had one <highlight>particular</highlight> shining star in his life—his uncle, who was a well-known actor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莱斯利·尼尔森的童年很艰辛，但他一生中有一颗特别闪亮的明星——他的叔叔，一位著名演员。

examination_example.sentence: Students should be able to extend the logic (逻辑) of each to their <highlight>particular</highlight> circumstance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生应该能够将每个人的逻辑延伸到他们的特定环境。
